edu.ncsu.csc316.hr.manager

Class HumanResourcesManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc316.hr.manager.HumanResourcesManager

  • public class HumanResourcesManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that allows the user to either create an organizational profile of a set of employees by tier or remove an employee and promote a supervised employee to interim employee.
    Author:
    Jimmy Nguyen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HumanResourcesManager(java.lang.String pathToEmployeeFile, java.lang.String pathToResumeFile)
      Constructs a new HR manager with the given input files

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void appendNodesToTree(GeneralTree.Node n, LinkedList<java.lang.String> employeeInfo)
      An algorithm that helps build the general tree of employee information.
      void buildTree(LinkedList<java.lang.String> employeeInfo)
      Builds the general tree, in which the shape of the tree is determined by the ordering specifically defined in the given list of input lines taken from the employee information file.
      void chooseInterim(GeneralTree.Node node)
      A recursive algorithm that helps determine the interim employee to replace the removed employee.
      java.lang.String generateOrganizationalProfile()
      Returns the string representation of the organizational profile of the company using the given input employee file.
      BinarySearchTree<Resume> getResumeTree()
      Returns the resume tree.

      A recursive algorithm that helps find the employee to remove, given the first and last name of the employee.
      java.lang.String removeEmployee(java.lang.String first, java.lang.String last)
      Returns a string representation of the interim employee who replaces the removed employee.

                             java.lang.String pathToResumeFile)

    • Method Detail

      • buildTree

        public void buildTree(LinkedList<java.lang.String> employeeInfo)
        Builds the general tree, in which the shape of the tree is determined by the ordering specifically defined in the given list of input lines taken from the employee information file.
        Parameters:
        employeeInfo - the list representation of each input line from the employee information file

      • appendNodesToTree

        public void appendNodesToTree(GeneralTree.Node n,
                              LinkedList<java.lang.String> employeeInfo)
        An algorithm that helps build the general tree of employee information.
        Parameters:
        n - the current parent node
        employeeInfo - the list representation of each input line from the employee information file

      • removeEmployee

        public java.lang.String removeEmployee(java.lang.String first,
                                       java.lang.String last)
        Returns a string representation of the interim employee who replaces the removed employee. If the removed employee does not supervise any other employees, then remove the employee and return "No interim supervisor"
        Parameters:
        first - - the first name of the employee to remove
        last - - the last name of the employee to remove
        Returns:
        the name of the employee who was promoted to interim supervisor

      • removeEmployee

        public java.lang.String removeEmployee(GeneralTree.Node node,
                                       java.lang.String first,
                                       java.lang.String last)
        A recursive algorithm that helps find the employee to remove, given the first and last name of the employee. If the employee to remove is found, then the chooseInterim recursive algorithm is called to replace the removed employee. Returns the interim employee that replaces the removed employee, or null if the employee to remove was not found.
        Parameters:
        node - the current node to find the employee information
        first - the first name of the employee to remove
        last - the last name of the employee to remove
        Returns:
        the interim employee information or null if the employee was not found

      • chooseInterim

        public void chooseInterim(GeneralTree.Node node)
        A recursive algorithm that helps determine the interim employee to replace the removed employee.
        Parameters:
        node - the current node to find the interim employee for

      • generateOrganizationalProfile

        public java.lang.String generateOrganizationalProfile()
        Returns the string representation of the organizational profile of the company using the given input employee file. Note that the level-order traversal algorithm is referenced from the CSC316 Tree lecture slides on page 22, provided by Jason King.
        Returns:
        the organizational profile

      • getResumeTree

        public BinarySearchTree<Resume> getResumeTree()
        Returns the resume tree.
        Returns:
        the resume tree.
